<JD_START>
Job Title: Boutique Stylist

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
WHO WE AREMaria Pinto is a contemporary American designer and artist who creates beautiful, versatile fashion with a modern, urban edge. She is passionate about designing clothing that makes today‚Äôs woman feel gorgeous and confident, and has dressed some of the world‚Äôs most fashionable women, including First Lady Michelle Obama, Marcia Gay Harden, Brooke Shields, and Oprah Winfrey.The Maria Pinto label marries superior design quality‚Äîsculptural lines, luxe-feeling Italian fabrics‚Äîwith ease and versatility. Most of the pieces are machine-washable and very travel-friendly. The clothes are designed to fit a wide range of body types and sizes, and can be styled in a number of ways to transition seamlessly from casual to formal events. It is a collection that makes women feel beautiful and keeps up with their busy lives.
WHO YOU AREMaria Pinto aims to create a groundbreaking dressing experience for women who love to look good but are too busy to spend a lot of time creating their wardrobe. Maria Pinto offers these women thoughtful, personalized customer service. We invite you to join us in creating that experience!As a Boutique Stylist, you will elevate the shopping experience by assisting clients one-on-one in our River North Boutique and digitally throughout the day.This is a dynamic opportunity for a sales driven individual. We are looking for someone who is passionate about the Maria Pinto brand and eager to educate our clients about it and our exceptional product.This is a unique sales opportunity in that the Boutique Stylist is involved with product development and has the opportunity to work directly with the designer, Maria Pinto, and back of the house planning team by providing insight and input based on feedback and learnings from client interactions.The ideal candidate has a relatable attitude and is able to walk clients through Maria Pinto‚Äôs story, quickly assess their needs, and provide exceptional customer service that makes each woman feel special, understood, and joyful.
WHAT WILL YOU DO?Consistently meet and exceed individual sales goalsGrow and develop Maria Pinto‚Äôs client base through one-on-one interactions in our Boutique and through personalized outreach, inviting customers back into the shop, and reactivating lapsed clientsMaintain up to date and detailed client profilesBe a trusted source of knowledge on clothing, fabrics, promotions, events, policies, and service for all clientsSuggest and style garments to show the versatility of Maria Pinto pieces based on client profiles and feedbackDevelop relationships with clients and based on learnings, provide feedback to planning and design team for upcoming merchandise plansHelp host events in the Boutique and virtually, to grow and develop our client base through intimate interactionsStrategize and take initiative to increase individual and store productivityBecome proficient in merchandise, POS, and company proceduresMaintain visual presentation and cleanliness standards at the Boutique
YOU MAY BE THE PERFECT CANDIDATE IFYou are results drivenYou have excellent interpersonal skills to ensure clear and effective communication with clientsYou have an innate ability and desire to connect and interact positively with those around youYou are responsible, punctual, curious, and enthusiasticYou have brand and industry knowledge and enthusiasm for creating personal styling experiencesYou have an infectiously positive attitude and are willing to take on just about any task that comes your wayYou are comfortable at quickly learning and adapting to technologyYou have prior experience with POS and CRM solutions (preferred)You have a commitment to growth
MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS INCLUDEMinimum of 4 years (preferably 5+) of retail sales experience in women‚Äôs ready to wearEducation: BS/BA preferred
COMPANY PERKSOpportunity to work closely and collaborate with renowned designer, Maria PintoCompensation: $25/hour with tiered commission structure set up for a significant upsideMerchandise discountUnlimited growth opportunitiesBoutique hours: Monday - Saturday, 10am - 6pm & Sunday, 12 - 5pm

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
